title: Elixir: An Alternative to JavaScript-Based Web Development
author: Loraine Lawson
description: Some frustrated JavaScript developers have turned to Elixir and its Phoenix framework. They claim it has faster development and lower costs.
cntitle: Elixir：JavaScript Web 开发的替代方案
cndescription: 一些沮丧的 JavaScript 开发者已经转向 Elixir 及其 Phoenix 框架。他们声称它具有更快的开发速度和更低的成本。
